title: State AGs to launch separate Facebook, Google probes: WSJ
text: State attorneys general are formally launching separate antitrust probes into Facebook Inc. FB, +2.01% and Alphabet Inc.'s GOOG, +2.54% Google unit starting next week, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter. The Google probe, led by Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton, will be announced Monday with a bipartisan group of about three dozen state attorneys general, the report said. An overlapping bipartisan group of attorneys general led by New York Attorney General Letitia James, is organizing the Facebook probe, the report said.
